abstract: Rabbi Yael Buechler runs Midrash Manicures club at Solomon Schechter School of Westchester in Hartsdale, NY, in which she teaches girls to do their nails with designs inspired by the weekly Torah portion.
snippet: In the Midrash Manicures club at Solomon Schechter School of Westchester, a rabbi teaches pupils how to do their nails with designs inspired by the weekly Torah portion.
lead_paragraph: In the Midrash Manicures club at Solomon Schechter School of Westchester, a rabbi teaches pupils how to do their nails with designs inspired by the weekly Torah portion.

headline.main: Bringing the Torah to Life on Painted Nails
headline.print_headline: In a School Club, Bringing the Torah to Life on Painted Nails
headline.seo: Manicures and Torah Studies Merge in a Westchester School Club
